page.title: 15CLUBS
page.content: To a certain extent Gartly provides its own entertainment as a very self-sufficient Community Club is run on all weekday evenings (except Thursdays) in the autumn/winter and spring terms in this school. Community Club activities include badminton, bowls and table-tennis. Thursdays are the nights (once a month) when the Women's Rural Institute meets.The other Thursdays are free for the use of school or any who may apply. The P.T.A.,a Brownie Pack,and a pre-school group also meet regularly in the school. Many people travel to Huntly to part- icipate in Guides,Cubs, Scouts,rifle shooting,swimming clubs and the Towns- women's Guild. Gartly Church Women's Guild and the Karate Club meet in Gartly Hall, just outwith this block.
